DOC.brief_title: Artery Function Responses Changes Blood Flow
DOC.detailed_description: Interested individual invite lab screen familiarization visit , brachial artery ( BA ) scan vet image quality BA flow-mediated dilation test perform ensure participant tolerance collection visit . All qualify participant instructed refrain vigorous physical activity > 24 hour , alcohol caffeine > 6 hour , food > 4 hour prior two collection visit . Upon arrival , basic anthropometric measure collect hematocrit measure duplicate finger prick blood sample equivalent two 70 µl capillary tube . Each two data collection visit begin 10 minute supine rest , participant instrument skin temperature probe forearm hand measurement skin temperature , single-lead ECG ( Powerlab model ML795 , ADInstruments , Colorado Springs , CO , USA ) non-invasive finger cuff ( Finometer MIDI , Finapres , The Netherlands ) continuous heart rate blood pressure monitoring . On first data collection visit , follow rest , participant undergo three 10-minute intervention apply left forearm follow sequence : ( 1 ) ECG-gated suprasystolic ( 300 mmHg ) cuff compression inflation occur every heart cycle , ( 2 ) 42 °C heat heating blanket , ( 3 ) ECG-gated rhythmic handgrip exercise 30 % MVC contraction occur every heart cycle . 10-minute rest period separate intervention allow return baseline condition . On second data collection visit , follow rest , participant undergo three variation 10-minute cuff compression intervention , order randomize . The three variation differ trigger delay R spike ECG cause inflation cuff compression . The original intervention involve data acquisition unit trigger inflation cuff systole ( R spike ) ( 0 delay ) . This condition compare two trigger delay , specifically trigger inflation cuff 0.2s 0.4s R spike . For data collection visit , BA blood velocity , blood flow turbulence , endothelial shear stress , oscillatory shear index assess intervention ; relative flow-mediated dilation assess immediately intervention . Participants provide write informed consent prior begin portion study .
